name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D Debut】Watch the way I move~ #3DemonDebut #holoadvent [2Nob6f5dy7c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Nerissa Ravencroft performing 'Say My Name' on stage.
Nerissa introduces her 3D debut cooking show 'Delicious Demonic Dishes' and her guests Takane Lui and Takanashi Kiara.
The cooking segment begins with Takane Lui leading the preparation of Nikujaga.

subtitles.original: Hi-ya darlings! This is Hololive English Advent's
subtitles.english: Hi-ya darlings! This is Hololive English Advent's

subtitles.original: devilish diva, and today, I'm here hosting a cooking show
subtitles.english: devilish diva, and today, I'm here hosting a cooking show

subtitles.original: in my very own kitchen, "Delicious Demonic Dishes"!
subtitles.english: in my very own kitchen, "Delicious Demonic Dishes"!

subtitles.original: As you can see, it's basically my kitchen, however,
subtitles.english: As you can see, it's basically my kitchen, however,

subtitles.original: I must tell you this is actually a replica. If you'd like to look
subtitles.english: I must tell you this is actually a replica. If you'd like to look

subtitles.original: on the other side... Yes, you can see the Jailbirds
subtitles.english: on the other side... Yes, you can see the Jailbirds

subtitles.original: hard at work making sure that this show goes on without a hitch.
subtitles.english: hard at work making sure that this show goes on without a hitch.

subtitles.original: But, today is also about me!
subtitles.english: But, today is also about me!

subtitles.original: As you can see, it's my 3D debut! How do I look? How is it?
subtitles.english: As you can see, it's my 3D debut! How do I look? How is it?

subtitles.original: Am I beautiful? Am I kawaii? Am I...
subtitles.english: Am I beautiful? Am I kawaii? Am I...

subtitles.original: mecha sexy? (Laughs)
subtitles.english: mecha sexy? (Laughs)

subtitles.original: Oh, you could look me up and down, I suppose.
subtitles.english: Oh, you could look me up and down, I suppose.

subtitles.original: Starting with my lovely shoes... going all the way up
subtitles.english: Starting with my lovely shoes... going all the way up

subtitles.original: to my skirt... and you might realize something's missing.
subtitles.english: to my skirt... and you might realize something's missing.

subtitles.original: Since we're cooking today, I've decided to remove my jacket.
subtitles.english: Since we're cooking today, I've decided to remove my jacket.

subtitles.original: So say goodbye to my wings.
subtitles.english: So say goodbye to my wings.

subtitles.original: But without further ado, I suppose we ought to get cooking,
subtitles.english: But without further ado, I suppose we ought to get cooking,

subtitles.original: right? Get right onto things! So, first,
subtitles.english: right? Get right onto things! So, first,

subtitles.original: I suppose I have two lovely guests I'd like you to meet,
subtitles.english: I suppose I have two lovely guests I'd like you to meet,

subtitles.original: if they'd like to come on out!
subtitles.english: if they'd like to come on out!

subtitles.original: Keke-riki! Hi!
subtitles.english: Keke-riki! Hi!

subtitles.original: Congratulations 3D debut!
subtitles.english: Congratulations 3D debut!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: Would you like to give an introduction real quick?
subtitles.english: Would you like to give an introduction real quick?

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh! You two?
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh! You two?

subtitles.original: Me? Douzo! Okay!
subtitles.english: Me? Go ahead! Okay!

subtitles.original: 待ったかね！待ったよ、待ったかね！
subtitles.english: Wait-a-kane! Wait no more, wait-a-kane!

subtitles.original: ホロライブJP、秘密結社holoX、鷹嶺ルイだよー！
subtitles.english: Hololive JP, Secret Society holoX, Takane Lui here!

subtitles.original: And then!
subtitles.english: And then!

subtitles.original: Hi! Hi everybody! Keke-riki!
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi everybody! Keke-riki!

subtitles.original: I am Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English Myth!
subtitles.english: I am Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English Myth!

subtitles.original: And you know something? We are...
subtitles.english: And you know something? We are...

subtitles.original: Birds! Birds! Birds! Birds! Birds! Birds!
subtitles.english: Birds! Birds! Birds! Birds! Birds! Birds!

subtitles.original: HoloTori and HoloTori Intern! Intern!
subtitles.english: HoloTori and HoloTori Intern! Intern!

subtitles.original: So, will you like, prove yourself to us today?
subtitles.english: So, will you like, prove yourself to us today?

subtitles.original: Mhm! So, they're going to be cooking,
subtitles.english: Mhm! So, they're going to be cooking,

subtitles.original: and I'm going to be cooking! But,
subtitles.english: and I'm going to be cooking! But,

subtitles.original: shall we start with the first dish? Yes, I am hungry!
subtitles.english: shall we start with the first dish? Yes, I am hungry!

subtitles.original: I'm hungry too, Lui-nee!
subtitles.english: I'm hungry too, Lui-nee!

subtitles.original: Lui's going to be making us something called Nikujaga!
subtitles.english: Lui's going to be making us something called Nikujaga!

subtitles.original: Okay! Nikujaga! Japanese traditional food! I love Nikujaga!
subtitles.english: Okay! Nikujaga! Japanese traditional food! I love Nikujaga!

subtitles.original: It's my first time, so I'm very excited! Shall we get started?
subtitles.english: It's my first time, so I'm very excited! Shall we get started?

subtitles.original: Yeah! お願いします！ Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Please! Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!

subtitles.original: All right, let's start make Nikujaga!
subtitles.english: All right, let's start making Nikujaga!

subtitles.original: Yay! Nikujaga, Nikujaga! Abunai, abunai!
subtitles.english: Yay! Nikujaga, Nikujaga! Careful, careful!

subtitles.original: I'm hungry, hungry, hungry! Please make Nikujaga!
subtitles.english: I'm hungry, hungry, hungry! Please make Nikujaga!

subtitles.original: I will make Nikujaga for Nerissa!
subtitles.english: I will make Nikujaga for Nerissa!

subtitles.original: Yay! Oh my god! Oh, sorry, sorry, sorry!
subtitles.english: Yay! Oh my god! Oh, sorry, sorry, sorry!

subtitles.original: You too, don't worry! You too, you too! Thank you!
subtitles.english: You too, don't worry! You too, you too! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Yes, senpai too! Senpai too! All right, here,
subtitles.english: Yes, senpai too! Senpai too! All right, here,

subtitles.english: This is Lui's personal recipe! My Nikujaga recipe! Okay,

subtitles.english: let's start with cutting! Vegetable cutting!

subtitles.original: Okay, じゃがいも切ります。
subtitles.english: Okay, I'll cut the potatoes.

subtitles.original: (SFX: Rapid chopping) Oh! And put them in the pan.
subtitles.english: (SFX: Rapid chopping) Oh! And put them in the pan.

subtitles.original: Hoi! Yes! Oh, sugoi!
subtitles.english: Hop! Yes! Oh, amazing!

subtitles.original: And fry! Yes, stir! Oh, it's already in there!
subtitles.english: And fry! Yes, stir! Oh, it's already in there!

subtitles.original: Oh, sugoi! You made them appear out of nowhere!
subtitles.english: Oh, amazing! You made them appear out of nowhere!

subtitles.original: And please first fry meat! Meat first! Meat first! Yes, meat first!
subtitles.english: And please first fry meat! Meat first! Meat first! Yes, meat first!

subtitles.original: And then, change the color, changed color,
subtitles.english: And then, change the color, changed color,

subtitles.original: and put vegetables. Hai! Okay, so not like we did it
subtitles.english: and put vegetables. Yes! Okay, so not like we did it

subtitles.original: where we threw the potato in first! Yeah! Cook the meat then add
subtitles.english: where we threw the potato in first! Yeah! Cook the meat then add

subtitles.original: the vegetables and cook them down. Oh, it looks so good!
subtitles.english: the vegetables and cook them down. Oh, it looks so good!

subtitles.original: Yes! Smells good! And changed the color!
subtitles.english: Yes! Smells good! And changed the color!

subtitles.original: Oh, it's okay! Good! Ready! Already!
subtitles.english: Oh, it's okay! Good! Ready! Already!

subtitles.original: So, yeah, put water and...

subtitles.original:
Nikujaga (Meat and Potato Stew)
Potato: 4, Carrot: 2, Onion: 1, Shirataki noodles: 100g, Pork belly: 300g, Soy sauce: 3 tablespoons, Sugar: 3 tablespoons, Cooking sake: 3 tablespoons, dashi powder: 2 teaspoons, Mirin: 3 tablespoons, Salad oil: As needed
subtitles.english:
Nikujaga (Meat and Potato Stew)
Potato: 4, Carrot: 2, Onion: 1, Shirataki noodles: 100g, Pork belly: 300g, Soy sauce: 3 tablespoons, Sugar: 3 tablespoons, Cooking sake: 3 tablespoons, dashi powder: 2 teaspoons, Mirin: 3 tablespoons, Salad oil: As needed
